skills.name: Tempting Dream
skills.description: Attacks the enemy target to absorb the Attack Bar by 15% with a 30% chance and puts the enemy to sleep for 1 turn with a 10% chance. The damage increases accordingly to your Attack Speed.

skill_effect.name: Additional Attack
skill_effect.description: Attacks an additional time on the same turn.

skill_effect.name: Sleep
skill_effect.description: The monster is put to sleep and cannot attack unless awakened, either after a fixed amount of turns or after taking damage

skills.name: Nightmare Melody
skills.description: Puts all enemies to sleep for 1 turn and inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns with a 50% chance, each.

skills.name: Dreamy Leader (Passive)
skills.description: Removes a random beneficial effect granted on the enemy every turn and puts the enemy to sleep for 1 turn when the beneficial effect is successfully removed. [Automatic Effect]
